# Budy, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Budy  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Dźwierzuty, within Szczytno County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland. It lies approximately  south-west of Dźwierzuty,  north of Szczytno, and  east of the regional capital Olsztyn.
